colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I TSOGS THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, @042A *, ,DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA THAR PA CHEN PO'I PHYOGS SU RGYAS PA 'GYOD TSANGS KYIS SDIG SBYANGS PA STE, ,SANGS RGYAS SU GRUB PA RNAM PAR BKOD PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,)
